comment: барка на вывеску Адептус Амасекус, скиллчек Лор: Империум

languages.text: Под слоем ржавчины, царапин и древней краски едва заметны силуэты давно стертых букв. Несомненно, в прошлом эту грязную вывеску украшало гордое имя бюрократического сердца всего Империума — "Адептус Администратум"!

traits.locale_text: Под слоем ржавчины, царапин и древней краски едва заметны силуэты давно стертых букв. Несомненно, в прошлом эту грязную вывеску украшало гордое имя бюрократического сердца всего Империума — "Адептус Администратум"!

languages.text: Under a layer of rust, scratches, and ancient paint, the silhouettes of long-erased letters are barely visible. Undoubtedly, in the past, this filthy sign was adorned with the proud name of the bureaucratic heart of the entire Imperium — "Adeptus Administratum."
languages.original_text: Под слоем ржавчины, царапин и древней краски едва заметны силуэты давно стертых букв. Несомненно, в прошлом эту грязную вывеску украшало гордое имя бюрократического сердца всего Империума — "Адептус Администратум"!

traits.locale_text: Under a layer of rust, scratches and ancient paint, the silhouettes of long-erased letters are barely visible. Undoubtedly, in the past, this filthy sign was adorned with the proud name of the bureaucratic heart of the entire Imperium — Adeptus Administratum.

Under a layer of rust, scratches, and ancient paint, the silhouettes of long-erased letters are barely visible. Undoubtedly, in the past, this filthy sign was adorned with the proud name of the bureaucratic heart of the entire Imperium — "Adeptus Administratum."

Under a layer of rust, scratches, and ancient paint, the silhouettes of long-erased letters are barely visible. Undoubtedly, in the past, this filthy sign was adorned with the proud name of the bureaucratic heart of the entire Imperium — "Adeptus Administratum."

Under a layer of rust, scratches, and ancient paint, the silhouettes of long-erased letters are barely visible. Undoubtedly, in the past, this filthy sign was adorned with the proud name of the bureaucratic heart of the entire Imperium — "Adeptus Administratum."

languages.text: さび、傷、古い塗料の下に、消えてしまった文字の輪郭がかろうじて見える。間違いなく、過去にはこの汚れた看板に、帝国全体の官吏機構の中枢を示す誇らしい名前である『帝国行政局』が掲げられていたのであろう。
languages.original_text: Under a layer of rust, scratches, and ancient paint, the silhouettes of long-erased letters are barely visible. Undoubtedly, in the past, this filthy sign was adorned with the proud name of the bureaucratic heart of the entire Imperium — "Adeptus Administratum."

traits.locale_text: さび、傷、古い塗料の下に、消えてしまった文字の輪郭がかろうじて見える。間違いなく、過去にはこの汚れた看板に、帝国全体の官吏機構の中枢を示す誇らしい名前である『帝国行政局』が掲げられていたのであろう。

languages.text: Sous l'épaisse couche de rouille, de peinture écaillée et d'éraflures, on peine à discerner des lettres effacées depuis bien longtemps. Cela ne fait aucun doute que ce panneau répugnant était autrefois orné du nom du noble organisme bureaucratique de l'Imperium : l'Adeptus Administratum.
languages.original_text: Under a layer of rust, scratches, and ancient paint, the silhouettes of long-erased letters are barely visible. Undoubtedly, in the past, this filthy sign was adorned with the proud name of the bureaucratic heart of the entire Imperium — "Adeptus Administratum."

traits.locale_text: Sous l'épaisse couche de rouille, de peinture écaillée et d'éraflures, on peine à discerner des lettres effacées depuis bien longtemps. Cela ne fait aucun doute que ce panneau répugnant était autrefois orné du nom du noble organisme bureaucratique de l'Imperium : l'Adeptus Administratum.

languages.text: 招牌上蒙着厚厚的烟灰和污垢，以及不知多久之前刷的油漆。早已被腐蚀的字母轮廓依稀可见。毫无疑问，这块牌子过去曾属于帝国官僚机构的心脏——帝国内政部。
languages.original_text: Under a layer of rust, scratches, and ancient paint, the silhouettes of long-erased letters are barely visible. Undoubtedly, in the past, this filthy sign was adorned with the proud name of the bureaucratic heart of the entire Imperium — "Adeptus Administratum."

traits.locale_text: 招牌上蒙着厚厚的烟灰和污垢，以及不知多久之前刷的油漆。早已被腐蚀的字母轮廓依稀可见。毫无疑问，这块牌子过去曾属于帝国官僚机构的心脏——帝国内政部。

languages.text: Bajo una capa de óxido, arañazos y pintura antigua, apenas se distinguen unas letras borradas hace mucho tiempo. No cabe duda de que este mugriento letrero estaba adornado con el solemne nombre del poder burocrático de todo el Imperium: el «Adeptus Administratum».
languages.original_text: Under a layer of rust, scratches, and ancient paint, the silhouettes of long-erased letters are barely visible. Undoubtedly, in the past, this filthy sign was adorned with the proud name of the bureaucratic heart of the entire Imperium — "Adeptus Administratum."

traits.locale_text: Bajo una capa de óxido, arañazos y pintura antigua, apenas se distinguen unas letras borradas hace mucho tiempo. No cabe duda de que este mugriento letrero estaba adornado con el solemne nombre del poder burocrático de todo el Imperium: el «Adeptus Administratum».

languages.text: Unter einer Schicht aus Rost, Kratzern und uralter Farbe sind die Umrisse längst vergangener Buchstaben kaum mehr auszumachen. Früher einmal prangte auf diesem Schild gewiss der stolze Name des bürokratischen Herzens des gesamten Imperiums — "Adeptus Administratum".
languages.original_text: Under a layer of rust, scratches, and ancient paint, the silhouettes of long-erased letters are barely visible. Undoubtedly, in the past, this filthy sign was adorned with the proud name of the bureaucratic heart of the entire Imperium — "Adeptus Administratum."

traits.locale_text: Unter einer Schicht aus Rost, Kratzern und uralter Farbe sind die Umrisse längst vergangener Buchstaben kaum mehr auszumachen. Früher einmal prangte auf diesem Schild gewiss der stolze Name des bürokratischen Herzens des gesamten Imperiums — "Adeptus Administratum".

languages.text: Pas, çizik ve fi tarihinden kalma boya katmanlarının altındaki uzun zaman önce silinmiş harflerin silüetleri zar zor seçilebiliyor. Şüphe yok ki bu pislik içindeki levhayı bir zamanlar İmparatorluk'un bürokratik kalbinin şanlı ismi süslüyormuş: "Adeptus Administratum."
languages.original_text: Under a layer of rust, scratches, and ancient paint, the silhouettes of long-erased letters are barely visible. Undoubtedly, in the past, this filthy sign was adorned with the proud name of the bureaucratic heart of the entire Imperium — "Adeptus Administratum."

traits.locale_text: İs, çizik ve çok eskiden kalma boya tabakalarının altındaki uzun zaman önce silinmiş harflerin silüetleri zar zor seçilebiliyor. Şüphe yok ki geçmişte bu levha İmparatorluk'un bürokratik kalbinin şanlı ismiyle süslüymüş: "Adeptus Administratum."
